ComicInfo.Characters: Hulk [Bruce Banner](origin recap),General Thunderbolt Ross,Rick Jones,Toad Men (introduction),Betty Ross
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:14:56 [Issue ID 4000-5976] urn:comicvine:4000-5976 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 17:59:53. [Issue ID 17045]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Terror of the Toad Men, Part 1: Enter...the Toad Men: The Toad Men are above Earth, in search of its brightest scientist. Meanwhile, Rick and Bruce explore an underground cave where they hope to imprison Hulk each night.
[The Terror of the Toad Men] Part 5: The End of the Hulk?: Bruce Banner repels the Toad Men invasion.
[The Terror of the Toad Men] Part 4: Hulk Runs Amok!: Hulk escapes from his cell while General Ross forget about the Toad Men.
[The Terror of the Toad Men] Part 3: Bruce Banner, Wanted for Treason!: Bruce Banner is found in a Toad Men crashed spaceship while their fleet arrives on Earth.
[The Terror of the Toad Men] Part 2: Prisoners of the Toad Men!: The Toad men capture Bruce Banner and bring him to their spaceship.
ComicInfo.Teams: Tribbitites,United States Air Force,United States Army
